iti95:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti95:2.1: “Mendicants, there are these three ways of being provided with sensual pleasures.
iti95:2.3: Some sensual pleasures are simply present; some are for those who love to create; and some are for those who control the creations of others.
iti95:2.4: These are the three ways of being provided with sensual pleasures.”
